tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE configuration_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    app_name VARCHAR(255),
    config_type VARCHAR(50),
    config_value TEXT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ServerConfigurations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    server_name VARCHAR(50),
    server_ip VARCHAR(15),
    server_type VARCHAR(20),
    server_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentConfigurations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    environment_name VARCHAR(50),
    environment_type VARCHAR(20),
    config_key VARCHAR(50),
    config_value TEXT
);
